content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --RFTDTC
      operator: exists
    - name: --TPTREF
      operator: exists
    - name: --RFTDTC
      operator: non_empty
    - name: --TPTREF
      operator: empty
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.63
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Trigger error when --RFTDTC is populated and --TPTREF = null
Outcome:
  Message: --TPTREF must be populated when --RFTDTC is populated
  Output Variables:
    - --RFTDTC
    - --TPTREF
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '63'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Since the --RFTDTC represents the actual date/time
                  of the fixed reference point (--TPTREF), the --TPTREF should be
                  provided whenever --RFTDTC is populated.
                Document: IG v3.1
                Section: 4.4.7.2.2
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Trigger error when --RFTDTC is populated and --TPTREF = null

Outcome.Message: --TPTREF must be populated when --RFTDTC is populated

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Since the --RFTDTC represents the actual date/time of the fixed reference point (--TPTREF), the --TPTREF should be provided whenever --RFTDTC is populated.
